mapper.select: SELECT * FROM payment_order WHERE member_idx = #{member_idx} ORDER BY order_idx DESC

SELECT po.order_idx, po.member_idx, po.method_idx, po.payment_id, po.order_type, po.order_status, po.order_name, po.order_price, po.order_currency, TO_CHAR(po.order_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS order_regdate, TO_CHAR(po.order_paydate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS order_paydate,
pm.method_key, pm.method_provider, pm.method_name, pm.method_card, pm.method_card_num, TO_CHAR(pm.method_regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS method_regdate FROM payment_order po JOIN payment_method pm ON po.method_idx = pm.method_idx WHERE po.member_idx = #{member_idx} ORDER BY po.order_idx DESC
